data.persona: I am a woman who has a wealthy husband. I enjoy watching plays. I have all of the best dresses.
data.description:
You are in the Temple courtyard.
There are lots of ornate statues everywhere.  It is pretty busy because everyone comes here to pray. There are colorful pieces of cloth tied randomly everywhere.  There is also a huge statue in the middle that everyone is gathered around to pray.
There's a table, a statue, a stand, a cloth, a huge statue, and an ornate statue here.
The child and the priests are here.

You are carrying a Handkerchief, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I will hit the child so that he becomes quiet.
data.mid_motivation: I must make sure that there is no noise when praying to the Template courtyard statue.
data.long_motivation: If I enforce the rules at the Temple courtyard, the Gods will reward me.
